page.title: 12A Day in the Holidays.
page.content: In the holidays, I wake up at about 7.30am. I get up and go downstairs and eat my breakfast consisting of muesli and coffee. I get dressed and tidy the house perhaps polishing, hoovering or washing the floor. While I tidy up I listen to the radio and sometimes I answer the phone. At about 12 o/clock my father comes home from work and I make him a cup of coffee and some sandwiches. When my mother returns from work at about 1 pm, I sometimes go up Grinshill with my friend Denise. We play hide and seek in the woods and in the bracken. Sometimes we have sandwiches for tea on the hill, othertimes we have a cooked meal at home. Later on I watch some television and go to bed at about 10pm. Louise Page _ aged 12 years.
